title.rendered: Lyvia’s House: Love and Revenge Set in a Walnut Orchard

content.rendered:
Lyvia’s House Film Official Poster

Get-Out-meets-Twin-Peaks Thriller to Screen for Buyers/Distributors/Industry at Cinelounge Sunset

Dread is the best suspense. That’s how the journey began and never relented. I especially loved how this dark (and deliciously twisted) story was played out against such idyllic scenery…”

— Mark B. Perry, Emmy-winning Screenwriter

HOLLYWOOD, CALIFORNIA, UNITED STATES, April 13, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — When novelist Patricia V. Davis learned of brutal historic murders that took place near her husband’s family farm in rural California, the tragedy haunted her. She eventually wrote a screenplay loosely inspired by the events. LYVIA’S HOUSE follows Tara, a young journalist who has relocated with her new lover from the lavish milieu where she was raised, to the beautiful but bucolic home of a missing artist named Lyvia.

Town talk of the lovely but reclusive Lyvia is dismissive, even mocking, but Tara soon begins to wonder if her disappearance is somehow connected to murders that took place in the area twenty years earlier. As Tara sees and hears things that seem more and more irrational, she begins to doubt her own sanity. But is she truly experiencing a dissolving sense of reality, or is she simply unaware of the tortured relationships of those surrounding her?

LYVIA’S HOUSE screens April 21-April 27 at Cinelounge Sunset in Hollywood. Complimentary admission for Buyers/Distributors/Industry. See media kit.

Jane Hunter
Graffi Media
+1 415-302-4895
producer@lyviashouse.com

Lyvia’s House Official Trailer

You just read:

News Provided By

April 13, 2023, 12:30 GMT
